channel.title: Just wondering
channel.description:
I was just wondering how many people in the UK support the Manchester United team, it come to my conclusion that there must have been at least one member of this forum at the old Trafford stadium today.
[b]Game:[/b] Manchester United vs Birmingham
[b]Kick off:[/b]
1:30PM
Was anyone there?

item.title: Just wondering
item.dc:creator: @wales_00 wales 00
item.description:
@wales_00 wrote:

I’ve supported them from the age of 7, although the team is falling a little I seem to still enjoy them playing.

Sir Alex Ferguson didn’t put a strong defence on the field yesterday, hopefully we will see more from Rooney and the other strikers.

Read full topic

item.title: Just wondering
item.dc:creator: @SilentCJ SilentCJ
item.description:
@SilentCJ wrote:

I support them.
I never actually watch football, but i support them for 2 reasons, i like the colour red, and i have a lot of cousins who also support them.

Oh but, i wasn’t there. I was sat at home.

Read full topic
